mapper.select: SELECT SEN_MEM_NAME, SEN_MEM_BIRTH, SEN_MEM_PHONE_MID, SEN_MEM_PHONE_BACK, SEN_MEM_PASSWORD FROM MBS_SEN_MEMBER WHERE SEN_MEM_NUM = 600
SELECT P.PRO_MEM_NAME, P.PRO_MEM_PHONE_MID, P.PRO_MEM_PHONE_BACK FROM MBS_PRO_MEMBER P JOIN MBS_SEN_MEMBER S ON S.PRO_MEM_NUM = P.PRO_MEM_NUM WHERE SEN_MEM_NUM = 600

SELECT R.TEST_RESULT_DATE , R.TEST_RESULT_SCORE , L.TEST_LIST_NAME FROM MBS_TEST_RESULT R JOIN MBS_TEST_LIST L ON R.TEST_LIST_NUM = L.TEST_LIST_NUM WHERE SEN_MEM_NUM = 600 ORDER BY TEST_RESULT_DATE DESC
